name: Entertain Session (READ DESC!)
description:
*HEAVILY INSPIRED BY PEOPLE PLAYGROUND, THIS WAS MADE TO RELIEVE STRESS*

Entertain session is a game created for people who are stressed, If you're stressed you can boot up the game and freaking beat up a ragdoll!

there's some good ol' lofi in the background to maybe help more

music: https://www.chosic.com/free-music/lofi/
